# Data
```{r}
bixi_data <- read.csv("bixi_part_1.csv")
head(bixi_data)
```

# Descriptive statistics and histograms 
```{r}
summary(bixi_data)
summary<-sapply(bixi_data,function(x) c(mean(x),sd(x),min(x),max(x),length(x)))
row.names(summary)<-c("mean","sd","min","max","n")
summary
```

# Histograms
```{r}
par(mfrow=c(1,2))
hist(bixi_data$lat,xlab="latitude")
hist(bixi_data$long,xlab="longitude")
hist(bixi_data$dur,xlab="trip duration")
hist(bixi_data$mm,xlab="departure month")
hist(bixi_data$jj,xlab="departure day")
hist(bixi_data$temp,xlab="average daily temperature")
hist(bixi_data$prec,xlab="daily rainfall (in mm)")
```
